review: I bought this for my boss & my mom's Christmas present and our family has so much fun streaming Netflix, Youtube (& Etc) from her tablet to our TV.The set up was not too difficult (we had some difficulties but I think it was a problem on our part). It was fun to see how much features they put into it though. I definitely appreciated seeing a product that was fully designed and not just 'first time testing out product'. It wasn't on the pricey side so it made me feel good to have a full-featured product.For the future though, I really hope 'chrome' on tablets could stream videos as well. This wasn't too much of a problem but it sometimes bothered us. Especially watching movies from Amazon, you couldn't stream it from the tablet. (Which actually led me to find out you can't stream it through a desktop/laptop either because it does not stream Silverline Media-- although I believe Netflix is silverline... strange-- I'm not an expert on this side so i'm not asking for arguments/comments);;Great purchase though!! We definitely used it enough to be worth every penny and more
author: kelly lim

review: I expected more. Such as screen mirroring and more app functionality. I've heard rumors of more but until then I'm not too happy with chromecast.
